attributes.comment:
USCIS should seek more efficiency in processing the applications and petitions,
not just put such heavy burgen on public. For an example, the reinstatment
applicaiton of F-1 status is currently instructed to continue to submit to local
district office and, then the local district office will forward the reinstatement
applications to Vermont Service Center. Which office will send adjudication
decision? The code of Federal Resister indicated that "The district director may
consider granting the request..." Then it should be forwarded back to the disctrict
office after Vermont Service Center processed. It seems that this route system for
only mentioned reinstatement application takes time and resource. Could DHS
seek better way?
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
